entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Calgary (Olympic Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Canada Olympic Park 04:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: SSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Fog. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog becoming fog patches late this morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
